# `scope commands` for [core](/commands/categories/core.md)

<div class='command-title'>Output info on the commands in the current scope.</div>

## Signature

```> scope commands {flags} ```


## Input/output types:

| input   | output    |
| ------- | --------- |
| nothing | list\<any\> |

## Examples

Show the commands in the current scope
```nu
> scope commands

```
